sqlMap.select:
SELECT MER_ID ,BALANCE ,FEE ,RATE ,STATUS ,CREATE_TIME ,FINISH_TIME ,BACK_URL ,MER_NAME ,AVAILABLE_BALANCE ,BLOCKED_BALANCES ,AVAILABLE_FEE ,BLOCKED_FEE ,PAY_TRACT ,MER_SYS_ID ,MER_TYPE ,TRANS_MER_ID ,ACCOUNT_NO FROM V2_BANK_BEHALF_MER_CONFIG WHERE 1=1 AND V2_BANK_BEHALF_MER_CONFIG.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(MER_ID) =#mer_id#
(BALANCE) =#balance#
(FEE) =#fee#
(RATE) =#rate#
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BACK_URL) Like '%'||(#back_url:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AVAILABLE_BALANCE) =#available_balance#
(BLOCKED_BALANCES) =#blocked_balances#
(AVAILABLE_FEE) =#available_fee#
(BLOCKED_FEE) =#blocked_fee#
(PAY_TRACT) Like '%'||(#pay_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_sys_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_TYPE) Like '%'||(#mer_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_NO) Like '%'||(#account_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM V2_BANK_BEHALF_MER_CONFIG WHERE 1=1 AND V2_BANK_BEHALF_MER_CONFIG.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(MER_ID) =#mer_id#
(BALANCE) =#balance#
(FEE) =#fee#
(RATE) =#rate#
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BACK_URL) Like '%'||(#back_url:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AVAILABLE_BALANCE) =#available_balance#
(BLOCKED_BALANCES) =#blocked_balances#
(AVAILABLE_FEE) =#available_fee#
(BLOCKED_FEE) =#blocked_fee#
(PAY_TRACT) Like '%'||(#pay_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_sys_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_TYPE) Like '%'||(#mer_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_NO) Like '%'||(#account_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
